Some of you may perhaps feel that there is no need for your committee to meet
because you have not recently been called upon by the staff. I hope that you
will take this opportunity to meet, decide what you think you should be doing,
and then make these suggestions to the staff. This will be a great help to
us. We are hoping that all NAEB committees will be meeting. It has also
been suggested that you may want to have your meeting "open” to anyone who
wishes to come. I leave this entirely up to you.
We are assuming that if you decide to hold a committee meeting on either or
both of the days provided, you will notify your committee members. However,
if you let us know in time, we will also put an announcement in the Newsletter.
As soon as possible, will you please let me know whether you plan to have a
meeting and on which day. We will provide the rooms; you can take care of
the other arrangements.
